entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
